statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficViolations;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, location FROM TrafficViolations;
SELECT * FROM TrafficViolations WHERE violation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_plate_number, officer_name FROM TrafficViolations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding';
SELECT violation_id, violation_date, location FROM TrafficViolations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficViolations ORDER BY violation_date DESC, violation_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_plate_number, violation_type, location FROM TrafficViolations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding'
SELECT officer_name, COUNT(*) as total_violations FROM TrafficViolations GROUP BY officer_name ORDER BY total_violations DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT vehicle_plate_number) as unique_vehicles FROM TrafficViolations
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) as total_violations FROM TrafficViolations GROUP BY violation_type HAVING total_violations > 5
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date, location FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT vehicle_license_plate, violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 100;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date, location FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE officer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC, fine_amount ASC
SELECT violation_type, location, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' AND location LIKE '%Highway%'
SELECT vehicle_license_plate, violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY fine_amount DESC
SELECT citations.citation_id, citations.officer_name, traffic_violations.location FROM citations JOIN traffic_violations ON citations.violation_id = traffic_violations.violation_id
SELECT * FROM TrafficViolations;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date FROM TrafficViolations WHERE violation_type='Speeding';
SELECT * FROM Vehicles ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM TrafficViolations GROUP BY violation_type;
SELECT license_plate, owner_name, vehicle_type FROM Vehicles JOIN Citations ON Vehicles.vehicle_id = Citations.vehicle_id WHERE issued_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TrafficViolations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding'
SELECT * FROM Vehicles ORDER BY owner_name ASC
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) FROM TrafficViolations GROUP BY violation_type

SELECT v.owner_name, t.violation_type, c.issued_date FROM Vehicles v JOIN TrafficViolations t ON t.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN Citations c ON c.violation_id = t.violation_id WHERE t.violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY c.issued_date DESC
SELECT v.owner_name, v.vehicle_type, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM Vehicles v JOIN TrafficViolations t ON t.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.owner_name, v.vehicle_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras
SELECT camera_id, location, city FROM traffic_cameras
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make='Toyota'
SELECT plate_number, make, color FROM vehicles ORDER BY make DESC
SELECT violations.*, citations.amount FROM violations JOIN citations ON violations.violation_id=citations.violation_id
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT plate_number, make, model, color FROM vehicles WHERE color = 'red' ORDER BY make ASC;

SELECT cc.camera_id, cc.location, v.plate_number, v.model FROM traffic_cameras cc JOIN violations vv ON cc.camera_id = vv.camera_id JOIN vehicles v ON vv.plate_number = v.plate_number WHERE v.color = 'blue';

SELECT v.make, v.color, ci.amount FROM vehicles v JOIN violations vv ON v.plate_number = vv.plate_number JOIN citations ci ON vv.violation_id = ci.violation_id WHERE ci.amount >= 100 ORDER BY v.make DESC, ci.amount ASC;

SELECT cc.city, v.color, ci.amount FROM traffic_cameras cc JOIN violations vv ON cc.camera_id = vv.camera_id JOIN vehicles v ON vv.plate_number = v.plate_number JOIN citations ci ON vv.violation_id = ci.violation_id WHERE cc.city = 'Los Angeles' AND ci.status = 'unpaid';
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location, direction FROM Traffic_Cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM Vehicles ORDER BY license_plate DESC;
SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.license_plate, v.vehicle_type, c.full_name FROM Vehicles v JOIN Officers c ON v.vehicle_id = c.officer_id;

SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.license_plate, v.vehicle_type, COUNT(*) AS num_violations FROM Vehicles v JOIN Violations viol ON v.vehicle_id = viol.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.vehicle_id HAVING num_violations > 1;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Cameras WHERE direction = 'North' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT Vehicles.vehicle_id, Vehicles.license_plate, Violations.violation_type FROM Vehicles JOIN Violations ON Vehicles.vehicle_id = Violations.vehicle_id WHERE Vehicles.vehicle_type = 'SUV';

SELECT Citations.citation_id, Citations.fine_amount, Officers.full_name FROM Citations JOIN Violations ON Citations.violation_id = Violations.violation_id JOIN Officers ON Officers.officer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE Citations.payment_status = 'Unpaid';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Cameras WHERE status = 'Active' GROUP BY direction;

SELECT Violations.violation_date, Citations.citation_date FROM Violations JOIN Citations ON Violations.violation_id = Citations.violation_id WHERE Citations.fine_amount > 100 ORDER BY Violations.violation_date ASC, Citations.citation_date DESC;
